newsitem.title: USA: Dow Industrials tumble, curbs reimposed.
newsitem.headline: Dow Industrials tumble, curbs reimposed.

text.p: U.S. blue chip stocks built on earlier losses to fall more than 60 points in early afternoon trading before pulling back slightly.
The Dow was down 49.01 points or 0.61 percent at 7879.31.
The New York Stock Exchange reimposed trading curbs at 1353 EDT/1753 GMT.
Nasdaq was off 3.95 points or 0.25 percent at 1579.45.
The long bond also eased off a touch from the day's high and was up 18/32 to yield 6.58 percent.
